item.title: Physics Reference
item.description: This is a reference for physics at the level of AP physics or college physics that is typically taught during the first year of university. It is mostly taken from the widely used textbook “university physics with modern physics”. ( Citation: Young, Freedman & al., 2011 Young,  H.,  Freedman,  R. & Ford,  A.  (2011).   University physics with modern physics 13th edition.   Addison-Wesley Reading, MA. ) Understanding of physics is very important because our entire society is built upon it.
